title: New monitor = Bad graphics !!!

embed.description: Use imgbox to upload, host and share all your images. It's simple, free and blazing fast!

body:
Hi,

I just bought a new monitor for my son who has been playing LOL for a very long time.

The monitor is an AOC G2460PF and everything looks fine until  he starts a new game. As you can see on the screenshot the graphics are totally messed up in game. Both the LOL client and the GPU drivers are up to date and the resolution is set to 1920 x 1080 both in the PC and in LOL.

I dont know what else to do so I really hope somebody can help me :-(

Here is some further info:

LOL
Res: 1920 x 1080
Size: Full screen
Graphics: Medium
Advanced: Uncapped

PC
OSY: Win 7 Home Premium (Servicepack 1)
CPU: Intel Core Duo E8400 3.00GHz
RAM: 4 GB
GPU: Nvidia Geforce 8800 GT
MON: AOC G2460PF

replies.body: Oh wow, that's pretty strange though it's awful the new monitor for your son came out like that.  If you swap out to the previous monitor, is the game restored to normal?  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for this specific case, so our tech team can help figure out what's going on.  We will reply back as soon as we can and assist you directly.

Thank you for your response.

The old monitor is a Samsung Syncmaster P2270. I have just tested the old monitor and the game works perfectly.

I will contact your support team and create a support ticket.

Thank you.
